alert.note: Alert for Logan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Thomas and Logan Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colby to 6 miles southwest of Russell Springs. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Colby around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Russell Springs. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 41 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
